snippet: With the Lakers’ fourth loss in a row and the ninth in 13 games since Mike D’Antoni became coach, Kobe Bryant’s exasperation has begun to show.
abstract: Los Angeles Lakers guard Kobe Bryant voices his frustration after team's loss to New York Knicks; loss is team's fourth in a row, and the ninth in 13 games since Mike D'Antoni became coach.
lead_paragraph: With the Lakers’ fourth loss in a row and the ninth in 13 games since Mike D’Antoni became coach, Kobe Bryant’s exasperation has begun to show.

headline.seo: Bryant’s Frustration Grows as Lakers’ Free Fall Continues
headline.main: Bryant’s Frustration Grows as Free Fall Continues
headline.print_headline: Bryant’s Frustration Grows as Free Fall Continues
